details:
Itinerary Description

Discover the energy of New York City with this 5-day adventure. From the lights of Times Square to the grandeur of the Statue of Liberty, iconic Central Park, and cultural landmarks like the Empire State Building and MoMA, you'll experience the best that NYC has to offer.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Times Square's vibrant energy
  • A visit to the Statue of Liberty
  • Central Park's natural beauty
  • A Broadway show experience
  • Empire State Building views
  • Shopping along Fifth Avenue
  • Exploring MoMA's world-class art collection
  • Exquisite New York City cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious The St. Regis New York, a 5-star hotel located in the heart of Manhattan, offering upscale amenities and world-class service.

description: Experience the hustle and bustle of NYC, visiting iconic sites and enjoying diverse cuisine over a full week.

details:
Itinerary Description

Experience a full week in New York City with this 7-day itinerary. From Times Square and Central Park to the Empire State Building, Brooklyn, and beyond, you'll explore the best of the Big Apple, dine at top restaurants, and shop in some of the world's most famous districts.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Times Square's vibrant energy
  • A visit to the Statue of Liberty
  • Central Park's natural beauty
  • A Broadway show experience
  • Iconic views from the Empire State Building and One World Observatory
  • Exploring Brooklyn's DUMBO
  • Shopping at Fifth Avenue
  • Luxurious hotel stays at The St. Regis, The Plaza, and Four Seasons New York Downtown
Accommodation

Stay at world-renowned hotels, including The St. Regis New York, The Plaza Hotel, and Four Seasons New York Downtown, offering unmatched service and luxury.

description: Explore the stunning landscapes, beaches, and culture of Sydney, from the Opera House to Bondi Beach.

days.activities: Taronga Zoo, Sydney Harbour Bridge Climb
Manly Beach, Ferry ride, and farewell dinner

iternaryDetails.title: Day 1: Arrival and Sydney Opera House
Day 2: Bondi Beach and Coastal Walk
Day 4: Taronga Zoo and Sydney Harbour Bridge Climb
Day 5: Manly Beach and Farewell Dinner
content: Farewell dinner at a local restaurant

details:
Itinerary Description

Discover the vibrant city of Sydney with this 5-day adventure. From the iconic Sydney Opera House to the picturesque Bondi Beach, the stunning Blue Mountains, and the thrill of the Harbour Bridge climb, this itinerary offers a perfect blend of urban excitement and natural beauty.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • A guided tour of the world-famous Sydney Opera House
  • Relaxation on the sandy shores of Bondi and Manly Beach
  • Scenic Coastal Walk with breathtaking ocean views
  • A full day exploring the majestic Blue Mountains
  • An exciting climb on the Sydney Harbour Bridge
  • Delicious Australian cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the Sydney Harbour Marriott, a luxurious 5-star hotel offering breathtaking views of the harbour and easy access to Sydney's top attractions.

description: Explore the stunning landscapes, beaches, and culture of Sydney, from the Opera House to Bondi Beach.

Free day for shopping and exploration, Departure

Visit the Art Gallery of NSW

iternaryDetails.title: Day 7: Free Day and Departure
content: Free day for shopping or additional sightseeing

details:
Itinerary Description

Discover the vibrant city of Sydney with this 7-day adventure. From the iconic Sydney Opera House to the picturesque Bondi Beach and the stunning Blue Mountains, this itinerary offers a perfect blend of urban excitement and natural beauty. Plus, visit Taronga Zoo, enjoy a Sydney Harbour Cruise, and relax at Manly Beach.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • A guided tour of the world-famous Sydney Opera House
  • Relaxation on the sandy shores of Bondi and Manly Beach
  • Scenic Coastal Walk with breathtaking ocean views
  • A full day exploring the majestic Blue Mountains
  • A visit to Taronga Zoo and a Sydney Harbour Cruise
  • Art and nature at the Royal Botanic Garden and Art Gallery of NSW
  • Delicious Australian cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious Sydney Harbour Marriott for most of your stay, with a night at Manly Pacific Hotel for easy access to Manly Beach.

details:
Itinerary Description

Immerse yourself in the lively spirit of Rio de Janeiro with this 5-day adventure. From the breathtaking views atop Sugarloaf Mountain to the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue, the serene beaches of Copacabana and Ipanema, the artistic Santa Teresa neighborhood, and the futuristic Museum of Tomorrow, this itinerary offers a perfect balance of cultural exploration and natural beauty.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Spectacular views from Sugarloaf Mountain
  • A visit to the awe-inspiring Christ the Redeemer statue
  • Relaxation on the world-famous Ipanema Beach
  • An adventure through the lush Tijuca National Park
  • A stroll through the artistic streets of Santa Teresa and the colorful Selarón Steps
  • A scenic boat tour of Guanabara Bay
  • Visit to the Museum of Tomorrow
  • Delicious Brazilian cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious Copacabana Palace, a historic 5-star hotel overlooking the famous Copacabana Beach, offering refined comfort and elegant amenities.

description: Discover the vibrant culture and stunning beaches of Rio, from Copacabana to Christ the Redeemer.

details:
Itinerary Description

Immerse yourself in the lively spirit of Rio de Janeiro with this 7-day adventure. From the breathtaking views atop Sugarloaf Mountain to the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue and the serene beaches of Copacabana and Ipanema, this itinerary offers a perfect balance of cultural exploration, sports, and natural beauty.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Spectacular views from Sugarloaf Mountain
  • A visit to the awe-inspiring Christ the Redeemer statue
  • Relaxation on the world-famous Ipanema Beach
  • An adventure through the lush Tijuca National Park
  • A tour of Maracanã Stadium
  • A boat trip to the stunning Ilha Grande
  • Delicious Brazilian cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious Copacabana Palace, a historic 5-star hotel overlooking the famous Copacabana Beach, offering refined comfort and elegant amenities.
